alert.note: Alert for Oldham (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 11:24PM CDT until May 29 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL OLDHAM COUNTY... At 1124 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles north of Adrian, or 17 miles northwest of Vega, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Oldham County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
